name: Radio Tower Defense - Scatter Jam 2016
description:
May have had ambitious goals, but we did meet the theme of "open to interpretation". It's a normal tower defense, but the towers need to get commands from the radio tower. Sometimes they get confused and you have to tap the radio tower fast to send out the right command. The faster you tap the faster the towers shoot again.

Multiple Towers, Multiple Enemies, Massive MAAAAAAAYYYYHEEEEEEEEEEMMMMMM.

..... ok.... maybe not the mayhem.

Programming by:

Randy Phillips

Russell Bockhorst

Ted Ryan

Art By:

M.K. Jones

Randy Phillips
